text: The Animatrix is a 2003 anime movie anthology with nine shorts. It is based on The Matrix series. ==Plot== ===The Second Renaissance=== ===Kid's Story=== ===Matriculated=== ==Cast== *Keanu Reeves as Thomas A. Anderson / Neo *Carrie- Anne Moss as Trinity *Clayton Weston as Kid *Kevin Michael Richardson as Thadeus *James Arnold Taylor as Ash *Debi Derryberry Category:2003 movies Category:2003 animated movies Category:Adult animated movies Category:English- language movies Category:Japanese-language movies Category:Madhouse (company) Category:The Matrix Category:Warner Bros. movies Category:Drone movies
title: The Animatrix
